title: android 11 update
content:
my Google Pixel 3 xl automatically updated to android 11, says to finish I have to restart my phone.
I'm afraid I will get a black screen of death again . I had my phone 3 days already went through this had to take back to store.
Plus my Google Pixel 2 done the same thing that's why I got a new phone , Thought nothing could be done.  So afraid to turn off my phone now.
